scripts.delete-data: node -e "const mongoose = require('mongoose'); const DataItem = require('./models/DataItem'); mongoose.connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI || 'mongodb://localhost:27017/crm').then(async () => { const result = await DataItem.deleteMany({}); console.log('Deleted', result.deletedCount, 'data items'); mongoose.disconnect(); }).catch(err => console.error(err));"
